net.hudup.core.logistic

Class UriAdapter.AdapterWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • net.hudup.core.logistic.UriAdapter.AdapterWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    UriAdapter

    public static class UriAdapter.AdapterWriter
extends java.io.Writer
implements AutoCloseable
    This class is the Writer (for writing operations on archives identified by URI) with support of URI adapter UriAdapter. In other words, it can do writing operations on any objects (archives) and hide all physical systems and protocols (file system, compressed file, HTTP, database, etc.).
    Version:
    11.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Field Detail

      • adapter

        protected UriAdapter adapter
        The URI adapter that supports writing operations. The built-in variable writer is created by this variable.

      • writer

        protected java.io.Writer writer
        The main Writer is actually used to do writing operations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdapterWriter

        public AdapterWriter(xURI uri,
                     boolean append)
        Constructor with URI of specified object (archive).
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of specified object (archive).
        append - Whether or not "append" mode is applied for writing. In "append" mode, content is added continuously to the end of the archive (file). Otherwise, the archive (file) is made empty and then content is put into the archive (file) from beginning.

      • AdapterWriter

        public AdapterWriter(DataConfig config,
                     boolean append)
        Constructor with configuration of specified object (archive).
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration of specified object (archive).
        append - Whether or not "append" mode is applied for writing. In "append" mode, content is added continuously to the end of the archive (file). Otherwise, the archive (file) is made empty and then content is put into the archive (file) from beginning.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: AutoCloseable
        The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object. The finalize() method of auto-closable class should call AutoCloseable.close() method so that AutoCloseable.close() method is called automatically before the Java garbage collector destroys auto-closable object.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in class java.io.Writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
